titleStmt.title: William Kirkland v. William Billings. Writ

distributor.name: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

bibl.title: William Kirkland v. William Billings. Writ
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: Territory of Washington County of Chehalis }
To the Sheriff or any Constable of said county

Whereas Edward Campbell has this day complained in writing under oath to the undersigned one of the Justices of the Peace in and for said county on the 12th day AD 1872 at my office in said county and says that Andrew J Campbell was murdered on the evening of the Eighth day of May AD 1872 and that he believes that the deed was commited by William Kirkland
Therefore in the name of the United States you are commanded forthwith to Apprehend the said William Kirkland and bring him before me to with according to Law
Given under my hand this 12th day of May AD 1872 H.D. Taylor Justice of the Peace

Before me H.D. Taylor a Justice of the Peace in and for the County of Chehalis Territory of Washington this day personally came Edward Campbell who complains and says that Andrew J Campbell was murdered on the evening of the Eighth day of May AD 1872 and that J.E. Campbell believes that the deed was commited by William Kirkland
Edward Campbell Sworn to and subscribe before me on this the 12th day of May AD 1872
H.D. Taylor Justice of the Peace
I hereby certify that the foregoing is a correct copy of all the proceedings had before me in the case of the Territory of Washington vs William Kirkland charged with the murder of A.J. Campbell
Given under my hand this 23rd day of May 1872 H.D. Taylor Justice of the Peace
